name: Kaijinn
description:
Kaijinn is a text-based inn simulator. You can play with only your mouse. You should prepare a meal for each unique customer and interact with them. Just remember, your choises effect all the world population.

All assets created by our artists. Just musics and sound effects are taken from pixabay.com & freesound.org
